The read_offsets functions¶

The The read_offsets functions function is top-level function in KENV. It reads offsets and rotations elements from beamlnes.

class kenv.accelerator.read_offsets(beamline: dict, z: numpy.arange)[source]¶

Offsets and rotations reading function.

Parameters

  • beamline (dict) – Accelerator`s beamline

  • z (an instance of the np.arange class) – Axis z

Returns

  • offset_correct_x (an instance of the interpolate.interp1d class) – Offset function

  • offset_correct_xp (an instance of the interpolate.interp1d class) – Rotation function

  • offset_correct_y (an instance of the interpolate.interp1d class) – Offset function

  • offset_correct_yp (an instance of the interpolate.interp1d class) – Rotation function
